reviewText:
INEXCUSABLY HORRIBLE audiovisual quality!

This is the exact same public domain VHS transfer so common on $1 DVD releases.
A crushing disappointment.
This is a true Japanese Sci-Fi classic film and very well done but it may never get the respect it deserves unfortunately.

Tragic.

*If you want a decent copy of this film and don't mind subtitles look for ASIN: B0093T4EJ2, a Japanese language edition.
My copy is DVD-R, Region 0 (ALL) and NTSC video format.
Quality is about 8/10, a Tremendous improvement over the English public domain version!
Fun old science fiction Japanese movie ... old  and hokey but if you like that sort of thing you will enjoy it.
Classic b-movie science fiction. Loved it!
